name: PoopLogger(LogyourPoops)
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: poop logger
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Have you ever wanted to know how many times you've pooped? Well, now you can. Welcome to Poop Logger, a place where you can log your poop counts. You will be surprised to realize how many times you've pooped.



To log your poop -------------- Say, "Log my poop"
Hear your poop count -------- Say, "Poop Count"
To remove a poop ------------ Say, "Remove a Poop"
To reset poop count to 0 ---- Say, "Reset Poop"
For help ------------------------ Say, "Help"



------------------------------------------------------------------
Please leave a nice review if you like the game. We really appreciate it and it helps encourage us to keep working on more and better skills. If you ever get stuck, say, how to play or contact us at www.RiseX.io before leaving a 1* review.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
